SELECT b.bno as bno, b.cate_code as cate_code, b.id as id, b.title as title, b.writer as writer, b.view_cnt as view_cnt, b.reco_cnt as reco_cnt, b.not_reco_cnt as not_reco_cnt, b.content as content, b.comt as comt, b.reg_date as reg_date, b.reg_id as reg_id, b.up_date as up_date, b.up_id as up_id, i.ino as ino, i.img as img, i.comt as comt, i.name as name FROM board b INNER JOIN image i ON b.bno = i.bno WHERE b.bno = #{bno};
